attributes.description:
This “Built Ford Tough” vehicle is the perfect partner for your business. Having the extra half-a-cab comes in handy where carrying valuable items or product that are not weatherproof behind the seats and a load bin which carries close to a ton. It is very user friendly. Features include: Fabric Seats, Aircon, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, canopy, Towbar, Rear Bin rubberizing, Alloy Wheels, CD Player, and much more. We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O 
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
David : 067 131 6474
